title: #454: Drinky Winky (OOTP 18, Dumbledore's Army)
description:
• News covers Cormoran Strike Book 5 "Troubled Blood," Cursed Child Japan and Fantastic Beasts 3
  • Muggle Mail: Harry's post-Hogwarts career, a sibling rivalry, and Dumbledore's boggart
  • Chapter-by-Chapter continues with Order of the Phoenix – Chapter 18: Dumbledore's Army
  • 7-Word Summary: Hogwarts is holding a group defense meeting
  • Harry can Accio a bullfrog? J.K. Rowling has said you can't accio inanimate objects
  • Are the Hogwarts professors secretly teaching DADA in their own classes?
  • How exactly did that conversation go between Dumbledore and Umbridge about the Gryffindor Quidditch Team?
  • Is Hermione right to reconsider forming Dumbledore's Army?
  • Is Sirius truly “reckless” and “living through” the trio?
  • Harry's connection with Voldemort strengthens! Why doesn't Harry consult an adult ?
  • Dobby, Winky, Hedwig and the Room of Requirement
  • We compare the Room of Requirement's use in Order of the Phoenix to it's use in Half-Blood Prince
  • We rate the the proposed names for Dumbledore's Army
  • Professor Potter
  • The Umbridge Suck Count climbs to 35!
  • Connecting The Threads, MVP of the Week and Rename The Chapter return!
  • Quizzitch: What does Hermione use to bewitch the golden coins for DA members?
  • Join our community at Patreon.com/MuggleCast and receive magical benefits, including Bonus MuggleCast!
  • MuggleCast has launched a listener survey so we can hear what you think of the show. Please take a couple minutes to fill it out!
  • This week's episode is sponsored by Openfit (texted 'MuggleCast' to 505050 for a free trial), Quip (visit GetQuip.com/muggle to get your first refill free) and ThirdLove (Visit ThirdLove.com/MuggleCast for 15% off your perfect fitting bra). This
